Quickstrike:










Quickstrike sat glowering up at Sinester. "Who do ya think ya are?" he said 
firmly. "Ya ain't threatin' me are ya? 'Cause if ya are, yer in fer trouble. 
It ain't smart t' mess wit' uh damaged bot like me. Senesis knows 'bout 
that!" He stood up, putting little pressure as he could on his leg, but he 
still grunted at it. "Ya wanna start somethin', tin-horn? Don't think ah 
can't kick yer kiester! But if yer smart, ya move outta mah way. Ah ain't in 
uh good mood. Sometimes ah never am!" His eyes glowed a bright crimson, 
while the metal at his cheeks shuddered.

He said to Sinesis without taking his eyes off of Sinester. "Tell yer friend 
t' back off b'fore ah tear his head off."
